name: AIRLOCK (itch) (Death Function)
description:
Experience the wonderful catharsis of putting something in an airlock and yeeting it into the cosmos.

Controls:

[W][S] = forward/backward

[A][D] = right/left

[Space][Left Shift] = ascend/descend

[Left Click] = pick up/interact

[Right Click] = throw

[Esc] = pause/back

Hope you enjoy!

- Zach

P.S.: sorry about the lack of screenshots I literally don't have time :/
